Coordinates extracted from a reliable source indicating the location of the Turamdih Mine. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Jaduguda (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turamdih_Uranium_Mine). Turamdih Mine is located 24 km west of Jaduguda and 5 km south of Tatanagar railway station

web_search_companies.notes: UCIL is a public sector undertaking under the Department of Atomic Energy, responsible for uranium mining and processing in India.
